Package main

Class Player

java.lang.Object
main.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Previewable
public class Player extends Object implements Previewable
A class for defining a player. Used to track the players information including their inventory and score and to create opponents for the player to face against.
Version:
1.1, Apr 2022.
Author:
Jackie Jone

      Returns:

    • removeItem

      Parameters:
      removeItem - item to remove from the player's inventory
      Returns:
      true if the item is successfully removed from the players inventory otherwise false
